achievements.name: The Marriage Game
achievements.description: Marry another character

achievements.name: A Pope of My Own
achievements.description: Set up an antipope

achievements.name: All Three Popes
achievements.description: Play a game where there are two simultaneous antipopes

achievements.name: Exalted Among Men
achievements.description: Fulfill the Become Exalted ambition

achievements.name: Until Death Do Us Part
achievements.description: Have your spouse assassinated

achievements.name: Always Bet On Duke
achievements.description: Work your way up from Count to Duke with a single character

achievements.name: Full House
achievements.description: Sire five children

achievements.name: Crusader
achievements.description: Fulfill the goal of a Crusade

achievements.name: Paragon of Virtue
achievements.description: Fulfill the Paragon of Virtue ambition

achievements.name: United the Kingdoms
achievements.description: Hold the kingdoms of England, Scotland, Wales and Ireland

achievements.name: On English Neck a Norman Yoke
achievements.description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark as William the Bastard, become the King of England

achievements.name: It's Good to be the King
achievements.description: Work your way up from Count to King with a single character

achievements.name: It's Better to be the Emperor
achievements.description: Work your way up from Count to Emperor with a single character

achievements.name: Survivor
achievements.description: Play a game all the way through from 1066 to 1453

achievements.name: Hard Ruler
achievements.description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark as Harald of Norway, become the King of England

achievements.name: Crusader King
achievements.description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark, hold the Kingdom of Jerusalem

achievements.name: Prester John
achievements.description: As a Catholic, have a border with Miaphysite Abyssinia

achievements.name: Russkaya Pravda
achievements.description: As a character with the Russian Culture, hold the Empire of Russia

achievements.name: The Outside Bet
achievements.description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark as Svend II of Denmark, become the King of England

achievements.name: Protector of the Holy Places
achievements.description: Have Rome, Jerusalem, Mecca and Medina within your Realm

achievements.name: Pentarch
achievements.description: As an Orthodox Christian, hold Rome, Constantinople, Alexandria, Antioch and Jerusalem

achievements.name: Legacy of Rome
achievements.description: Restore the Roman Empire

achievements.name: S.P.Q.R.
achievements.description: As the Roman Empire, reclaim the old imperial borders

achievements.name: The One Who Brings Benefit
achievements.description: As a Zoroastrian, become the prophesied Saoshyant

achievements.name: Kingdom of David
achievements.description: As a Jew, create the Kingdom of Israel

achievements.name: New Ways for Old Gods
achievements.description: Reform one of the Pagan religions

achievements.name: To Mecca!
achievements.description: Go on a Hajj to Mecca

achievements.name: Pilgrim
achievements.description: Go on a Christian Pilgrimage

achievements.name: Mr. Doge-Elect
achievements.description: As a Patrician, win an election and become Doge

achievements.name: Merchant Prince
achievements.description: Amass more than 20,000 in wealth

achievements.name: Saint
achievements.description: Amass more than 10,000 in piety

achievements.name: Celebrity
achievements.description: Amass more than 15,000 in prestige

achievements.name: Dream Home
achievements.description: As a Patrician dynasty, build every upgrade for your Family Palace

achievements.name: Trade Empire
achievements.description: Your Republic maintains trade posts in 80 provinces

achievements.name: Khan of Khans
achievements.description: Conquer continental Western Europe as the Mongol Empire, starting in "Age of the Mongols" bookmark

achievements.name: Viking Raider
achievements.description: As a Viking, return home with 1,000 worth of loot

achievements.name: And Stay Out!
achievements.description: Throw the Aztec invaders back into the sea

achievements.name: Persistent Survivor
achievements.description: Play a game all the way through from 867 to 1453

achievements.name: Divine Blood
achievements.description: Achieve a score of 100,000

achievements.name: Dragon Blood
achievements.description: Achieve a score of 50,000

achievements.name: Royal Blood
achievements.description: Achieve a score of 10,000

achievements.name: The Black Bishop
achievements.description: Fund an immoral bishop and get him elected Pope

achievements.name: The Caliphate Strikes Back
achievements.description: Starting in the "High Middle Ages" bookmark as the Abbasid Caliph, become independent and hold an empire title

achievements.name: Decadent Warrior
achievements.description: As a Muslim, crush a Decadence revolt

achievements.name: Keeping it in the Family
achievements.description: Sire a child that has the Inbred trait

achievements.name: Turbulent Priest
achievements.description: Assassinate a vassal bishop that likes the Pope better than you

achievements.name: Dwarf Fortress
achievements.description: Have seven courtiers with the Dwarf trait

achievements.name: Holy Smoke
achievements.description: Sacrifice another religion's head as a Norse or Aztec pagan

achievements.name: Empressive
achievements.description: Play as three consecutive generations of empresses

achievements.name: Black Widow
achievements.description: As a woman, have three different husbands killed

achievements.name: The British Raj
achievements.description: Rule the Empire of Britannia as a Hindu, Buddhist or Jain character

achievements.name: Beyond the Indus
achievements.description: As a ruler of non-Indian culture, conquer a King or Emperor title in India

achievements.name: My Very Own Subcontinent
achievements.description: Become Samrat Chakravartin

achievements.name: Kali Maaa
achievements.description: Sacrifice a King or Emperor tier character to Kali

achievements.name: I can see its Stripes
achievements.description: Kill a tiger by your own hand

achievements.name: Great Indian Sultanate
achievements.description: Rule the Empire of Rajastan and convert all its provinces to Islam

achievements.name: Saint Thomas's Dream
achievements.description: Rule an Indian Kingdom or Empire as a Christian and convert all its provinces

achievements.name: What Schism?
achievements.description: Convert both Rome and Constantinople to the same (Indian) religion

achievements.name: Red Sea Resort
achievements.description: Convert Mecca to Hinduism, Buddhism or Jainism

achievements.name: Looking East and West
achievements.description: Be Emperor of both Persia and Rajastan

achievements.name: Holy and Roman
achievements.description: Found the Holy Roman Empire in a game starting in 769

achievements.name: Empire of the Sun
achievements.description: Rule as Emperor with the Reformed Zun Faith

achievements.name: I Shed Blood of Saxon Men
achievements.description: As a Christian non-Saxon, completely conquer Saxony in a game starting in 769

achievements.name: Saxons Everywhere, Unite!
achievements.description: As an Anglo-Saxon or Saxon ruler, be king of both Saxony and England

achievements.name: The Frisian Coast is Long
achievements.description: Be King of Frisia and hold the Atlantic coast from Léon in Brittany to Jylland

achievements.name: Little Brother Rules!
achievements.description: Become Emperor of Francia as Carloman, brother of Charlemagne

achievements.name: Iron Crown
achievements.description: Hold any Emperor or King title as a Lombard after 1300

achievements.name: Viking Ummah
achievements.description: Have a capital province with Norse culture and Muslim religion

achievements.name: Medieval Schlieffen
achievements.description: Be simultaneously at war with the Aztecs and the Mongols

achievements.name: I'm Sorry, Desiderata
achievements.description: Divorce a Lombard Princess as a Christian

achievements.name: Seven Centuries
achievements.description: Play a game all the way through from 769 to 1453

achievements.name: Not a Tribe
achievements.description: Play as a Tribal Ruler and Reform to Feudalism

achievements.name: Res Publica
achievements.description: Play as a Tribal Ruler and Reform to Merchant Republic

achievements.name: Great Hunter
achievements.description: Kill your prey in the Epic Hunt

achievements.name: Casanova
achievements.description: Successfully seduce 10 people by targeted seduction with one character

achievements.name: Mudslinger
achievements.description: Successfully slander 20 people with one character

achievements.name: Family Bliss
achievements.description: Have 6 close family members as friends

achievements.name: We’re In Business
achievements.description: Successfully establish a trade route

achievements.name: Bring it On
achievements.description: Win 7 duels with one character

achievements.name: Wise Guy
achievements.description: Gain the Legendary Wisdom modifier

achievements.name: Let’s Play
achievements.description: Gain the Hedonist trait through carousing

achievements.name: Stargazer
achievements.description: Build an Observatory

achievements.name: By the Gods
achievements.description: Gain the Theologian trait

achievements.name: Steppe by Steppe
achievements.description: As a steppe horde, conquer the whole steppe region.

achievements.name: "Never start a Land War in Asia"
achievements.description: Start in Western Europe and completely conquer the region of Mongolia.

achievements.name: Norse-East
achievements.description: As a Norse character, become King of Mongolia.

achievements.name: Pax Mongolica
achievements.description: Build 3 fully upgraded silk road trade posts.

achievements.name: Sword to Ploughshare
achievements.description: Settle a steppe mercenary with more than 20 martial in your lands.

achievements.name: Let's go out into the Field
achievements.description: Defeat a sibling in a war using the rival casus belli.

achievements.name: Nobody's Business but the Turks
achievements.description: Conquer Constantinople as a Turkic steppe horde.

achievements.name: One Arrow Alone can be Easily Broken but Many Arrows are Indestructible
achievements.description: As a steppe horde, have a population of 150 000.

achievements.name: Go West Young Mongol
achievements.description: As a steppe horde, have an independent tributary King or Emperor in the British Isles

achievements.name: Who Needs Vasco da Gama?
achievements.description: Own all the silk route ports in india as a European merchant republic.

achievements.name: Run With the Wolf
achievements.description: Play as a character with Wolf's Blood.

achievements.name: The Yes Men
achievements.description: Have all members of your council be Loyalists.

achievements.name: You Owe Me
achievements.description: Have someone owe you a Favor

achievements.name: Shadow Prince
achievements.description: Sit on the council and have every other council member as well as the ruler owing you a favor.

achievements.name: Pay to Win
achievements.description: Win a war using Mercenaries.

achievements.name: Mercotransaction
achievements.description: Create a mercenary band and have them bring in money for you.

achievements.name: One is not Amused
achievements.description: As a ruler have a council that is not content.

achievements.name: Follow Me
achievements.description: Successfully intervene in a youth's development to force one of your own traits onto them.

achievements.name: Prodigious Five
achievements.description: Have at least one child with each of the five level four education traits.

achievements.name: I am the Law
achievements.description: As a vassal use a favor to change a law.

achievements.name: Peace in Our Time
achievements.description: Enforce peace for 6 or more vassals.

achievements.name: Hospitable
achievements.description: Build a Hospital.

achievements.name: Papal Mache
achievements.description: Have elephants trample the Pope/Caliph.

achievements.name: Close Call
achievements.description: From Seclusion, kick someone out who had the plague.

achievements.name: An Honest Mistake
achievements.description: From Seclusion, kick someone out who did not have the plague.

achievements.name: No Solicitors
achievements.description: Go into Seclusion.

achievements.name: Not So Bad
achievements.description: Survive the End Times.

achievements.name: Eternity Denied
achievements.description: Kill a character with the Immortal trait.

achievements.name: There Can Be Only One
achievements.description: Become immortal.

achievements.name: Typhoid Mary
achievements.description: Contract three symptoms.

achievements.name: Scarrrrrred for Life
achievements.description: Become One-Eyed, One-Legged and One-Handed.

achievements.name: I Got Better
achievements.description: Recover from the Black Death.

achievements.name: Aptly Named
achievements.description: Die from the Black Death.

achievements.name: Unwelcome Visitors
achievements.description: As an assassin, assassinate a Crusader King in the Holy land.

achievements.name: Dark Lord
achievements.description: Become Grandmaster of any devil-worshiper society.

achievements.name: Birthright
achievements.description: As the Anti-Christ/spawn of Satan, become Grandmaster of the Satanists.

achievements.name: Jihad Sultan
achievements.description: As a Muslim King or higher, become Grandmaster of the Assassins.

achievements.name: Black Pope
achievements.description: Have a priest you corrupted (as a Satanist) become Pope.

achievements.name: Smash the Patriarchy
achievements.description: As female Messalian/Bogomilist/Cathar Ruler own all 5 baronies which make up the Orthodox Pentarchies and have a female temple holder control them.

achievements.name: The Good Old Days
achievements.description: Have the kingdom of Frisia as your primary title and have the duchies of Flanders and Brabant be dejure part of it.

achievements.name: Got Land
achievements.description: Start as the holder of Gotland and form the empire of Scandinavia.

achievements.name: Legacy of the Indo-Norse
achievements.description: Start as a Norse Character, hold a Kingdom in India as your primary title. Your capital must also be located in India and converted to Norse.

achievements.name: Off with their heads!
achievements.description: Execute 10 or more prisoners in a single action.

achievements.name: Aladdin
achievements.description: Starting and staying as a Han Chinese character, be an independent King or Emperor and rule all of North Africa (the Maghreb region).

achievements.name: Ten Thrones
achievements.description: Have your dynasty rule 10 independent Feudal/Iqta/Monastic Feudal Kingdoms or Empires with at least 25 realm size each. You must be one of them.

achievements.name: A Servant No More
achievements.description: As Mu’nis al-Muzaffar of Galilee in 867, become an Emperor and have at least 100 realm size.

achievements.name: White Hun
achievements.description: Starting as the last remnant of the White Huns (the Count of Mohadavasaka in 769) restore the borders of the Hephthalite Empire.

achievements.name: The Conqueror
achievements.description: Starting as a Norse character, rule the Kingdom of England (or the Empire of Britannia) as an English cultured character of a Christian religion.

achievements.name: Sakya Trizin
achievements.description: Starting as the Count of Sakya in 1066, rule as an independent Buddhist King or Emperor and control all Buddhist Holy Sites.

achievements.name: Child of the Dragon
achievements.description: Request an Imperial Marriage from China.

achievements.name: Bön Appétit!
achievements.description: Eat a character of the Bön religion.

achievements.name: Snipped off to China
achievements.description: Send a Eunuch to the Chinese Emperor.

achievements.name: A Curious Trinket
achievements.description: Send an invaluable artifact (Quality: 4 or 5) to the Emperor of China.

achievements.name: Headhunter
achievements.description: Found a Bloodline as a particularly cunning, ruthless and skilled Duelist.

achievements.name: Defender of the Holy Sepulchre
achievements.description: Starting as Eustache de Boulogne (the Count of Boulogne in France) in 1066, choose to play as your beneficiary after they are made King or Queen in Jerusalem after a Crusade.

achievements.name: Venetian Guile
achievements.description: Win a Crusade targeting Byzantium.

achievements.name: Deus Vult
achievements.description: Create the Empire of the Outremer.

achievements.name: History is in my Blood
achievements.description: Have 5 Historical Bloodlines on your character.

achievements.name: I Do Not Play Chess
achievements.description: Have 100 kills in your Kill List.

achievements.name: L'Eglise, c'est Moi!
achievements.description: As an Emperor, grab the crown out of the Pope's hands and crown yourself.

achievements.name: Zero to Hero
achievements.description: Found a Legendary Bloodline while part of a Warrior Lodge.

achievements.name: Heathenous Ways
achievements.description: Starting as Erik the Heathen in 1066, rule the Kingdom of Sweden with the reformed Germanic Faith.

achievements.name: By Jupiter!
achievements.description: Reform the Hellenic faith.

achievements.name: Bloody Line
achievements.description: As a religion worshipping Bloodthirsty Gods, sacrifice enough people to found a Bloodline.

achievements.name: Pagan Fury
achievements.description: As a ruler with any Pagan religion, win a Christian Crusade targeting you.

achievements.name: Under the Power of the Eternal Heaven
achievements.description: As a member of the Ashina clan, solidify your divinity by ruling as Religious Head of the Reformed Tengri religion.

achievements.name: From Servant to Saint
achievements.description: Have a character you used to play be proclaimed a saint and have their Saintly Bloodline running in your veins.

achievements.name: Family First
achievements.description: As a character with a religion that practice Divine Marriages, have one of your siblings, parents and children as spouses/consorts at the same time.

achievements.name: Bless my Reign down in Africa
achievements.description: As a King or Emperor, have one of your domain Counties under the influence of a successful Rain Dance.

achievements.name: Over Your Dead Body
achievements.description: As a Tribal ruler, gain a title you have a claim on by duelling the holder.

achievements.name: Lech, Czech, and Rus
achievements.description: Unite the Kingdoms of the three brothers, Lech, Czech and Rus, into one Slavic Union.

achievements.name: Baptism of Rus’
achievements.description: As an East Slavic Pagan King or Emperor with your capital in the Eastern Europe region, successfully ask the ruler of Byzantium for a mass conversion.

achievements.name: Love is a Battlefield
achievements.description: Find love after a duel.

achievements.name: From the Ashes
achievements.description: Starting in a Shattered World, rule an Empire.

achievements.name: Not so Great
achievements.description: Starting in a Shattered World, defeat a Great Conqueror in a war.

achievements.name: Rise of Civilization
achievements.description: In a Shattered World with ‘Holding Types’ set to ‘Tribal’ or ‘Tribal & Nomadic’, adopt Feudalism or Republicanism.

achievements.name: What Could Have Been
achievements.description: Start a Random World with all possible settings set to ‘Random’ and play for 200 years.

achievements.name: Lord of the Flies
achievements.description: Start a Random World as a 0 year old Count, with the maximum character age set to 0, become King or Emperor within 16 years.
